tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of content which promotes or glorifies violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

title: Prohibits the posting of content which promotes or glorifies violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
quoteText: (I) Share any Content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, obscene, violent, abusive, tortious, defamatory, libelous, vulgar, lewd, profane, invasive of anotherâ€™s privacy, hateful, or otherwise objectionable;
